Model Number: BCM94321MC. Compatibility: *''Apple MacBook'' @ 2.1 / 2.4GHz Core 2 Duo *''Apple MacBook'' @ 2.0 (Santa Rosa) / 2.2 GHz Core 2 Duo *''Apple MacBook Pro'' 15" @ 2.4 / 2.6GHz (Penryn) Core 2 Duo *''Apple MacBook Pro'' 17" @ 2.5GHz (Penryn) Core 2 Duo ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:1-BCM4321MC.JPG File:2-BCM4321MC.JPG

 Capabilities: [d0] Express Endpoint, MSI 00
 Capabilities: [100] Advanced Error Reporting
 Capabilities: [13c] Virtual Channel
 Capabilities: [160] Device Serial Number c8-35-c2-ff-ff-bb-00-1e
 Capabilities: [16c] Power Budgeting 
 Kernel driver in use: b43-pci-bridge
